overview: The face of an angel and a body for sin. Meet Bel Ami's newest superstar: The One and Only Hoyt Kogan. Hoyt Kogan is definitely the new up and coming superstar. Hoyt has the iconic Bel Ami look about him that makes him an instant hit. Or maybe it’s his perfectly sculpted body or his piercing eyes or his super model good looks."
title: The One & Only Hoyt Kogan
